mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_rest (nm, addr, lat, lng, i_category, phone, price_range, open_time, close_time, ctnt, i_district) VALUES (#{nm}, #{addr}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{i_category}, #{phone}, #{price_range}, #{open_time}, #{close_time}, #{ctnt}, #{i_district})
INSERT INTO t_rest_pic (i_rest, seq, food_pic) SELECT #{i_rest}, ifnull(max(seq), 0) + 1, #{food_pic} FROM t_rest_pic
INSERT INTO t_review (i_user, i_rest, grade, ctnt) VALUES (#{i_user}, #{i_rest}, #{grade}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT i_category, val as category_val FROM t_category
SELECT i_district, val as district_val FROM t_district
SELECT i_rest, seq, food_pic FROM t_rest_pic
SELECT A.seq, A.i_user, A.i_rest, A.grade, A.ctnt, A.m_dt, B.nm FROM t_review A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user ORDER BY m_dt DESC
SELECT COUNT(seq) AS review_cnt FROM t_review WHERE i_rest = #{i_rest}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_rest SET menu_pic = #{menu_pic} WHERE i_rest = #{i_rest}
